title: Cant find the champion right for me
body: Ive been playing since late s3 (na and oce) and throughout that time i have also played every champ but ive never found one that i can go back to no matter what and still have fun playing. Ive played some characters for a while but then got bored and rarely play them again. Im into mechanical farm champs.

replies.body: Look at statistical analysis of your account and develop your skill on the one you win most with.
Could you evaluate? like when you say "statistical analysis" would that be using a site? eg lolking or something and looking at my stats?

> [{quoted}](name=Zenix,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AmqjGyrR,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-07-02T09:21:53.656+0000)
>
> Could you evaluate? like when you say "statistical analysis" would that be using a site? eg lolking or something and looking at my stats?

https://oce.op.gg

> [{quoted}](name=Zenix,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AmqjGyrR,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-07-02T09:21:53.656+0000)
>
> Could you evaluate? like when you say "statistical analysis" would that be using a site? eg lolking or something and looking at my stats?

Opgg or some such.  Shows win rates with the champs you play. Helped me shed a few champs which I sucked with.

> [{quoted}](name=Essembie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AmqjGyrR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-01T20:07:47.037+0000)
>
> Look at statistical analysis of your account and develop your skill on the one you win most with.

OR you could just play the champion based on theme and character. Like boobies? I recommend Ahri or even Miss Fortune.
Like to be evil? Why not Veiger or Darius?

Find a character that you like the theme of.

> [{quoted}](name=TheHobbits,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AmqjGyrR,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-07-02T03:46:17.457+0000)
>
> OR you could just play the champion based on theme and character. Like boobies? I recommend Ahri or even Miss Fortune.
> Like to be evil? Why not Veiger or Darius?
> 
> Find a character that you like the theme of.

I'm a leg man. Therefore,  sivir.

> [{quoted}](name=TheHobbits,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AmqjGyrR,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-07-02T03:46:17.457+0000)
>
> OR you could just play the champion based on theme and character. Like boobies? I recommend Ahri or even Miss Fortune.
> Like to be evil? Why not Veiger or Darius?
> 
> Find a character that you like the theme of.

Veiger isn't really evil. I mean, read his lore.

>  i have also played every champ but ive never found one that i can go back to no matter what and still have fun playing. 

ok, so what do you want then?
To find a champ that i can go back to and have fun playing no matter what lol
